alert.note: Alert for Howell (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 5:55PM CDT until April 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN HOWELL COUNTY... At 554 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Plains, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... West Plains around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include South Fork, Brandsville, Lanton, White Church, Moody, Pottersville and Peace Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
